20101209011035.000|20101209011037.000|CCO|TALKS WHILE BUILDING CONTINUES.
20101209011037.000|20101209011039.000|CCO|>> THEY HAVE CONTINUED TO
20101209011039.000|20101209011041.000|CCO|VIOLATE ALL THE PREVIOUS
